name: Empty Room
description: You stand in an empty room. You can walk _north east_, _north west_, _south east_, _south west_, _west_, _east_, _north_, or _south. You can just stand in the _center_.

sections.name: north east
sections.description: Nothing to see here, might as well move along...

sections.name: north west
sections.description: Nothing to see here, might as well move along...

sections.name: south west
sections.description: Nothing to see here, might as well move along...

sections.name: south east
sections.description: Nothing to see here, might as well move along...

sections.name: west
sections.description: Nothing to see here, might as well move along...

sections.name: east
sections.description: Nothing to see here, might as well move along...

sections.name: north
sections.description: Nothing to see here, might as well move along...

sections.name: south
sections.description: Nothing to see here, might as well move along...

sections.name: center
sections.description: Nothing to see here but a _mote of dust_, might as well move along...

items.name: mote of dust
items.successMessage: You pickup the mote of dust.
items.failMessage: You pickup the mote of dust but it slips through your fingers.
